On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Richelle

 Herald Square

⏲ 10:40 p.m. on Wednesday, January 15

What are you doing today?

I am going over to sign a lease on a new apartment, then going to work.

What's your favorite part of the day?

My favorite part of the day is mornings. I spend time reading my bible. It’s very refreshing to me, and revitalizing. That’s how I spend my morning: a cup of coffee and God’s word.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Tomorrow I’m moving into my new apartment. And then going to work.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
